channel.title: array on Powershell | IT Quicktasks
channel.description: Recent content in array on Powershell | IT Quicktasks

item.title: Processing each powershell array value
item.description: Using the example in variable assignment And you want to do something to each variable, you may do the following: foreach ($i in $container_ids) { $i } So for instance, you want to delete all the containers: foreach ($i in $container_ids) { docker rm $i }

item.title: Assign Command Output to Powershell Array
